Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality features and the effort put into its development, we believe its value extends beyond $150. Considering this, I propose a special introductory offer of $120 for you today. This is a fantastic opportunity to own a product that truly stands out in its category. I look forward to your consideration and the chance to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
